projects.name: Stock Forecasting
projects.short: Stock forecasting of next day closing prices using a variety of methods including recurrent neural networks, gated recurrent networks, long-short term networks, various continuos hidden markov model variations and various forms of ensemble regression.

projects.name: Chess AI
projects.short: Created a chess AI which uses case-based reasoning (CBR) and rule based heuristics to improve alpha beta search in chess. CBR is used to find optimal opening moves, and rule based heuristics are used to prune unnecessary moves lightening the load of the alpha-beta minimax algorithm. A genetic algorithm was used to compute the optimal weights for the evaluation heuristic

projects.name: Meiotic Exit Network
projects.short: Computational biophysics research project to establish a system level understanding of the meiotic termination network

projects.name: Exoplanet Hunting
projects.short: Using light fluctuation data from NASA's Kepler telescope multiple different models are trained to classify exoplanets from non-exoplanets.

projects.name: Document Decoder
projects.short: Computer Vision project to turn images of a handwritten documents into machine readable text
